title: [6.1] Champion Select Bug - Unable to select champion after changing summoner spells
body:
Hey everyone,

While we continue to investigate the cause of this issue it would be a great help if you could send us a set of logs if you experience the issue. It's pretty easy to do:

1) Open the LoL patcher. (Your Play League of Legends shortcut or exe)
2) Open the "Help" window, by clicking the icon shown in the attached above
3) Select the "Save Logs" option and save the generated folder
4) Send them in an email to ocelivereports@riotgames.com

We'll then be able to check these out and see if we can figure out what is causing the problem.

Thanks so much for your help and patience.

**EDIT: 3:25PM 15/01/2016**
We've just deployed a patch for the client in OCE that should resolve issues that were occuring in champion select after Patch 6.1. 

If you're still seeing this issue, please restart your client and it will automatically download and install the update.

Please let us know if you're still having issues after downloading this update.
